channel.title: Css on Julien Pivotto
channel.description: Recent content in Css on Julien Pivotto

item.title: CSS update
item.description: As the YAML CSS project looks like dead, I have changed the design of my blog to Primer, the CSS Framework made by GitHub. I hope that you will enjoy it, it should be more readable and easy to navigate. Everything should have been ported to that new design. I have removed openpgp.js because it was not used. As a reminder I have a RSS feed that contains only my technical articles: the planet-inuits tag feed.
